basic_information.scholarship_name: Leland and Pauline Cooper Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Leland and Pauline Scholarship Committee

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate students within the College of Education and Professional Studies who are majoring in Organizational Leadership. Eligibility Requirements Must complete application process and include an up-to-date transcript Must be pursuing an undergraduate degree in Organizational Leadership Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Organizational Leadership   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Organizational Leadership   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Organizational Leadership
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Organizational Leadership   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Organizational Leadership   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Organizational Leadership
